name: Aura Syaakirah
greetingText: I really like your name baby!
wishText: I wish you long life, cheap fortune, always healthy, devoted to parents, what you want can be achieved, I say a good prayer to Allah :)
text2: Today it seems something is missing.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
